components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incident_updates.body: We are currently investigating an issue where some customer accounts are being unexpectedly closed. Impacted users may be unable to access their accounts, and recurring billable items may be deleted, which could affect business operations. Our team has identified the issue and is actively working on a resolution. We expect to provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body: We are currently investigating an issue where some customer accounts are being unexpectedly closed. Impacted users may be unable to access their accounts, and recurring billable items may be deleted, which could affect business operations. Our team has identified the issue and is actively working on a resolution. We expect to provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body:
We are currently investigating reports of unexpected customer account closures. The previous issuewhere MFA resets led to user and account closureshas been resolved. However, affected users are still unable to create new accounts, and impacted accounts remain closed. Our team is actively working to determine the root cause and restore access to affected accounts as quickly as possible.
We expect to provide another update in 60 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

incident_updates.body:
Our Account Portal is experiencing a partial outage related with reset 2FA causing user and account closures from the Console.
We are working to restore functionality as soon as possible. We expect to provide another update in 60 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: DEVELOPER TOOLS - Console

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America

incident_updates.body: Maintenance will begin as scheduled in 60 minutes.

Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 November 2025 at 22:00 PST until 03 November 2025 at 03:00 PST. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from United States handsets via subset of United States short codes.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - MMS Short Code, North America
